name: High School Simulator
description: Please enjoy high school life in Japan.[How to game]Operate with XBOX Controller or KeyboardkeyboardA : Left MoveD : Right MoveW: Front MoveS : Back MoveF: JumpG: Grab human / Pick up itemR: Crouch / AttackT: Action ButtonQ : DashE : VisionMouse L Click + Mouse Move: Camera MoveXbox Controller A: JumpB: Grab human / Pick up itemX: Crouch...
